attributes.comment:
If one wants to change the name on a Social Security Card, the cost is FREE.

To change your name on a driver?s license the cost is $10

To change a name on a Passport (within one year of issuance) the cost is FREE.

To change a name on the Certificate of Citizenship ? the only document that
satifies all requirements for proving US citizenship; a document only issued to
foreign born US citizens ? the cost is $380?

This *huge* discrepency shows clear discrimination against our children. How can
it possibly cost almost $400 to print a piece of paper? Our kids are American
citizens? and we are taxpayers.

Please reconsider.
Regards,
Cindy Janssen

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Cynthia Janssen
